title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.12 - Withdrawal or abandonment of a request for hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 519.12 - Withdrawal or abandonment of a request for hearing

State Regulations
(a) A request for a hearing is abandoned if
the hearing has not been rescheduled and the appellant does not appear at the
hearing on the scheduled date. (b) A hearing request may be withdrawn only under the following circumstances: (1)
the department receives a written
statement from the appellant stating that the request is withdrawn; or
(2)
the appellant makes a
statement on the record at the hearing withdrawing the request. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
519.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
